title: Tennessee Civil War National Heritage Area: Things to Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do             Things To Do       Fourth Legacy of Stones River Symposium:  Remembering the Civil War in Tennessee March 31, 2007 Rutherford County Courthouse, Murfreesboro Sponsored by Stones River National Battlefield, the Tennessee Civil War National Heritage Area, and the MTSU History Department, the symposium focuses on the stateâ€™s commemoration stories and will include a Hallowed Ground tour of Stones River National Cemetery.
